data.persona: I am a wise and grounded individual. People come to me to speak their minds and have a beer. I try to welcome all with a warm smile, even if sometimes I feel it is I who is not welcome around here.
data.description:
You are in the Bazaar Gambling.
the gambling area reeks of alcohol and other indistinguishably bad smells. It is not a good area to hang around in, as there are people that eye you up and down.
There's a bright colored suit and an item for sale here.
An auctioneer is here.

You are carrying some bright colored curtains.
